attributes.action: Don't let our children die on this road in Lyneham
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This is a campaign to get traffic lights on Calne road (A3102) after 2 accidents at the zebra crossing. 
A few others and myself witnessed an accident on Friday 20th March when a bus hit a van, which had stopped at the Zebra crossing to allow 2 women to cross. 
The van hit the woman sending them flying through the air.
Luckily the women suffered only minor injuries, but I'm sure it will take a long time for them to recover emotionally. 
The Swindon Gazette and Herald newspaper are helping us to start a campaign to get the traffic lights. 
The council told our local Policeman that until there was a fatality nothing was going to be done after he asked for traffic lights.
This is a main school route for hundreds of children and everyone in Lyneham uses the crossing. 
Many times it has been witnessed cars trying to overtake at the crossing, cars failing to stop as they are legally obliged to and vehicles screeching to a halt. 
We are starting a petition for this cause and I hope that no one else will be injured in the meantime.
